name: PackingBox
description:
In development

PackingBox is a simple 2d pixel-art isometric game where you play as a box.

Controls:

- Windows: use the arrow keys to go to up, left, right and down

- Android: touch the arrow buttons on screen to move

Rules:

- Collect the falling objects to increase your score, if you collect the diamonds you will receive... diamonds XD
- Unlock new islands and box skins
- Avoid the bombs, if you collect them you will explode and your score will back to zero, but you won't lose your diamonds, skins and islands.
- Don't stay stopped at the same place, a bomb might fall on your head

there are not many things still, the game is in development, so your feedback would help a lot

Comming soon:

- Music
- More skins
- More objects
- And more!
